page.title: 11 The A19 (Shipton).
page.content: We surveyed the A19 for ten minutes every half hour to see how many vehicles used it.We found averages for all the vehicles.These are the results{10 hours = 5400 vehicles {1 hour = 540 vehicles {1 minute = 9 vehicles 50 years ago about 1 vehicle would go past in 2-3 hours.Our results show what a busy road it is now. Mrs Savage is the schools crossing patrol or lolly pop lady.Her uniform is white with yellow strips.When she started 23 years ago the speed limit was 30mph but now it is 40mph.She doesn't think the road is adequate for the amount of traffic using it now. Many villagers think the A19 should be by-passed.Nearly all the people say there are too many accidents on the A19 and a crossing should be there to help children and old people cross.
